name: ArianaHuffington
text: But you have to do what you dream of doing even while you’re afraid.

name: JessicaAlba
text: My biggest baby is 11 today! I’m so proud of the kind, artistic, curious, sensitive, intelligent, compassionate person she’s become. Time goes by so fast. Family dinner at our favorite spot

name: Chamath
text: Make no mistake, we may be in a terrible place right now but the young people in this photo will soon be in charge and what they want is pretty clear.

name: BarackObama
text: It’s World Health Day, and we owe a profound debt of gratitude to all our medical professionals. They’re still giving their all for us every day, at great risk to themselves, and we can’t thank them enough for their bravery and their service.

name: RichardBranson
text: Tie-loathing adventurer, philanthropist & troublemaker, who believes in turning ideas into reality.

name: MarissaMayer
text: The highlight of my week was seeing season passes for Jackson Hole next year go on sale! I’m sure skiing will be different, but it makes me wish all the more that I had a fast forward button to get to next year.
